DOC.detailed_description: Design Overview . The investigator conduct two-arm Randomized Clinical Trial compare effect ReMind Mind intervention psychological physical health outcome cognitive task switch DMN TPN neural network Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( fMRI ) Diffusion Tensor Imaging ( DTI ) . The full ReMind intervention involve daily self-tailored mindful meditation application focus kindness compassion 4 week self-selected frequency use thereafter . The application use theoretically construct test delivered smart phone app free ( iPad , computer well ) . ReMind also include five resourcefulness training aspect : 1 ) one face-to-face session teach social ( help-seeking ) personal ( self-help ) resourcefulness skill , 2 ) ongoing web access video vignettes parent technology-dependent child describe application resourcefulness skill daily life , 3 ) 4 week skill ' reinforcement use daily journal writing parent , 4 ) weekly phone call intervention nurse 4 week face-to-face intervention training . The Mind Only intervention include meditation component . Thus , investigator able see addition Resourcefulness Training significantly impact proximal outcome ( self management behavior ) appraise sleep quality , positive health practice distal outcomes psychological health ( Mental Health Related Quality Life , depressive cognition , anxiety , caregiver burden ) , physical health ( Physical Health Related Quality Life ) , economic cost .
